metadata.dc:author: Voltas Bar√≥, Dolores
metadata.dc:description: In a society based on efficiency and productivity, rediscovering the role of the woman-mother as a human being with special traits that allow her to understand people as they really are, and what needs and aspirations they have is essential. Women manifest an affective, cultural and spiritual kind of maternity of incalculable value due to its influence on the development of each individual. At the same time, women must be allowed to play a full part in political and social ambits, working as equals along side men.
metadata.dc:title: La Mujer-Madre, un Valor Que Renace.
[The woman-mother, a recovered value].
metadata.dc:publisher: Cuadernos de bioetica : revista oficial de la Asociacion Espanola de Bioetica y Etica Medica
